testsuite.name: com.tutorialsninja.testsuite.desktops.DesktopsTest
testsuite.system-out: Hovering and Clicking on desktop [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> link text: Desktops] select A to Zfrom[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> id: input-sort] Clicking on product HPLP3065 [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> xpath: //a[contains(text(),'HP LP3065')]] Getting HPLP3065 text [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'HP LP3065')]] clearing current quantity and adding the specified amount Clicking on add to cart Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> xpath: //button[@id='button-cart']] Verifying if success message contains Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart! Clicking on shopping cart [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (978a49ea8a2309078607a2c0549f531a)] -> xpath: //div[@class='alert alert-success alert-dismissible']/a[2]] Verifying if success message contains Shopping Cart Verifying if success message contains 2022-11-30 Click to see screenshot Screenshot

Hovering and Clicking on desktop [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b7b298d110a01bc7cc0ebe7260f1546a)] -> link text: Desktops] Clicking on sort by button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b7b298d110a01bc7cc0ebe7260f1546a)] -> id: input-sort] selectName (Z - A)from[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b7b298d110a01bc7cc0ebe7260f1546a)] -> id: input-sort] Click to see screenshot Screenshot
